column2: an A.M. Eatery////After finding out the wait would be 45 min
column3: we almost left...but I'm SO GLAD we stayed! They offer complimentary coffee to people waiting
column4: but I was able to get a Bloody Mary at the bar while we waited (they make their own mix from scratch and it is delicious). The bartender was super personable and
column6: informed me that I could sub French toast for 1 or more of the pancakes on the pancake flight if I wanted to try more of a variety. The OMG! French toast definitely deserves its name. The place seems inefficient when it comes to clearing tables/seating people and the wait on the weekends can be very long
column7: but I'm still giving them 5 stars because the food was so good.
